record.field: Contract Renew - Send By Email Notify

field.name: body_html
field.div:
% set lines = ctx['lines']
Dear ${ctx['name']},
This email is an official notification that the employment contracts of the following employee(s) will end:
Employee Name Contract Reference Job Position Contract Expired PIC
% for line in lines
${line['employee_name']} ${line['contract_ref']} ${line['job_position']} ${line['contract_expired']} ${line['pic_name']}
% endfor
To ensure a smooth transition and avoid any potential disruptions, we kindly request your immediate attention to this matter. Please review the employee's performance, contributions, and overall fit within the team to determine the appropriate course of action.
Possible actions to consider include:
Contract Renewal: If the employee's performance is satisfactory and you intend to retain their services, please initiate the contract renewal process promptly.
Contract Termination: If the employee's performance is not meeting expectations or if there is a need to reduce the workforce, please commence the termination process according to company policies.
Contract Extension: If necessary, consider extending the contract temporarily while a longer-term plan is developed.
To assist you in making an informed decision, please refer to the employee's performance reviews, attendance records, and any other relevant documentation.
Should you require any assistance or clarification, please do not hesitate to contact the HR department.
If you are responsible for updating the contract, please click the button below
Go to System
Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.
